title: SolrJ UpdateRequest does not copy Basic Authentication Credentials
description:
SolrJ UpdateRequest.java creates "new" instances of itself but does not copy credentials.

Solution is to add two lines of code to UpdateRequest.java in the getRoutes method.

comments.author: Rajeshkumar
comments.content: In which Solr version this issue has been fixed?

comments.author: Shawn Heisey
comments.content:
This is a duplicate issue.  You need to look at the issue that it duplicates to see the fixed versions.

The duplicate links are in place.  If you visit this issue on the Jira website, the link is just under the description and above all the comments.
